sourcesContent:
<template>
    <BaseModal :show="show" class="modal-mask" @close="$emit('close')">
        <MainDmd :plane0="getCurrentImage()" :plane1="getBlendImage()"></MainDmd>
    </BaseModal>
</template>

<script>
import BaseModal from './BaseModal.vue';
import MainDmd from '.././dmd/MainDmd.vue';
import store from "./stores/store.js";
import { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';
import { useWpcEditStore } from '././stores/wpcEditStore.js';

const WpcEditStore = useWpcEditStore(store);

export default {
    name: 'FullFrameModal',
    setup() {
        const { maxFullFrameIndex } = storeToRefs(WpcEditStore);
            return {
            maxFullFrameIndex
        }
    },
    props: {
        show: Boolean,
        index: Number
    },
    methods: {
        getCurrentImage() {
            return WpcEditStore.getFullFrameImageAt(this.index).image;
        },
        getBlendImage() {
            return WpcEditStore.getFullFrameImageAt(this.index+1).image;
        }
    },
    components: { 
        BaseModal,
        MainDmd
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>


</style>
